description: This recipe comes from a spring holiday dinner party that Mark Bittman and Sam Sifton prepared in Charleston, S.C Cook the shrimp on the stove with olive oil and paprika, salt, pepper, garlic and lemon, and serve them as an appetizer with salads.
title: Shrimp, Mark's Way
title_page: Shrimp, Mark's Way Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This recipe comes from a spring holiday dinner party that Mark Bittman and Sam Sifton prepared in Charleston, S.C. Cook the shrimp on the stove with olive oil and paprika, salt, pepper, garlic and lemon, and serve them as an appetizer with salads.
Featured in: Feast In The South.
